snippet: A rare fielding error by Mark Teixeira in the seventh inning allowed the Tampa Bay Rays to score the deciding run, wasting a solid performance from pitcher Freddy Garcia.
abstract: New York Yankees defeat the Tampa Bay Rays, 4-3; rare fielding error by Yankees first baseman Mark Teixeira allows the deciding run.
lead_paragraph: A rare fielding error by Mark Teixeira in the seventh inning allowed the Tampa Bay Rays to score the deciding run, wasting a solid performance from pitcher Freddy Garcia.

headline.seo: Teixeira Makes First Error, and Rays Get by Yankees
headline.main: Teixeira Grabs Blame After Rays Rally, but Robertson Tries to Take It
headline.print_headline: Teixeira Grabs Blame After Rays Rally, but Robertson Tries to Take It
